mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, REG_DATE, UP_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{id} AND NAME = #{name} AND PWD = #{pwd}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND NAME = #{name}
SELECT PWD FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND ID = #{id}
